name: Google Calendar - Simplified
description:
Simplifies Google Calendar by removing the calendar header (except for the Settings link), footer, and other things.

Home page: https://snarfed.org/google_calendar_simplified_userstyle

Inspired by user 8006's original, now deprecated style 20945.

Also see style 36659.
